languages.text: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда противник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против персонажа, этот противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Когда противник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против персонажа, этот противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

每当敌人通过{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}攻击装备者时，敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续{g|Encyclopedia:Round}一轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人通过{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}攻击装备者时，敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续{g|Encyclopedia:Round}一轮{/g}。

languages.text: 敵が使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行うたび、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行い、失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵が使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行うたび、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行い、失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: Cuando un enemigo lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el portador, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un enemigo lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el portador, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Unternimmt ein Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen den Träger, muss der Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Unternimmt ein Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen den Träger, muss der Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre le porteur, cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, il est {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglé{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre le porteur, cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, il est {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglé{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
